metadata.othernotes:
Summary
-Despite dressing like a goth lolita, Perona is a pirate
-She ate the Hollow Hollow Devil Fruit, whose main ability allows her to create ghosts that make people negative for a brief period of time upon touching them. She can also fly because of her ability, and exit her body as a ghost.
-She calls herself a princess, although it's unknown if she was truly one (my headcanon is no, so it's just a self-impossed title)
-She used to have an group of servant zombie animals, but she lost them two years ago after her former crew was defeated. Now she's alone, and wants to reclaim what she used to have.

Personality
-She's obssesed with cuteness, or rather her own idea of "cute", which includes characters with petite figures, animal features and creepy motifs. Basically, anything that Tim Burton would like.
-While she acts pretentious and mean on the surface, Perona is actually quite lonely. She claims that her reason for playing the game is looking for a servant, but she'd be more than happy to settle for a friend. It's just that the only idea of friendship she has involves giving orders.
-While not being shy, she's also not confident in her own body due to not having anyone who's suppportive of her.
-Sexually she's very naive and inexperient.Also, while she has the straight tag I intend to make her more bicurious in the future.
-She's into cooking, especially making sweets and desserts.
-She's also kinda lazy and likes to sleep a lot.
-She has very strong opinions on fashion and personal image.

Good targeting topics
-Don't be afraid to push her buttons (make her angry, make her cry, etc.)
-On the other hand, humoring her delusions is the easiest way to get along with her.
-She's very naive and not very smart, so if someone tells her that something is real she'll most likely believe them.
-Her living situation (she lives in a castle with the world's strongest swordsman, and loves to complain about him a lot)

Bad targeting topics
-Asking her what her ability is (she already explains it in a generic case)
-"How can you fly?" (it's because of her ability)
-"What's a Devil Fruit?" (she also explains it in a case)
-Her childhood (not much is known in canon, so if she's asked something specific she'll either avoid the question or answer in vague terms)

case.name: Hollow Hollow Fruit
case.description: Perona shows and explains her ability

case.name: Astral Projection
case.description: When Perona climaxes she unconsciously leaves her body for a second

case.name: Kumacy
case.description: During her finished stage, Perona gets her doll back for the rest of the game

case.name: Peronass
case.description: She shows her butt after she gets naked

case.name: Encouragement
case.description: When the player loses, she decides to give them positive encouragement out of pity

case.name: Flying
case.description: Perona floats the entire game except for the last stage

case.name: Cute things
case.description: Perona asks the table what's the cutest thing they've ever seen.

case.name: Crowded
case.description: When the game starts, if the table is full, Perona will not so kindly ask the player to her left to move so she can put down her parasol. Can be responded to by targetting Perona's Relative Position and Distance.

case.name: Negative Hollow
case.description: There's a chance Perona gets fed up with Nami and uses her ability on her. Contact Metalytar if you want a similar interaction with another character.

case.name: Bye-Bye
case.description: After Perona takes off her dress, she can get bored the next time a player takes off an accessory and flies away...

case.name: Welcome back
case.description: ...but she comes back for the next round.

case.name: Flying
case.description: When she's naked, if an opponent takes off an accessory, she starts flying around the stage until she gets dizzy.

notes.note: Perona was defeated by a long nose guy, so she hates them
I corrected the marker in this case to "rouge12"
It's currently unknown how Perona acquired her DF, so I kept it a little vague
